---
title: "Abortion Tweets"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
pre_dobbs <- read_csv("abortion_pre_dobbs_tweets.csv")
post_dobbs <- read_csv("abortion_post_dobbs_tweets.csv")
```

```{r}
combined <- post_dobbs %>% full_join(pre_dobbs, by=c('id', 'user_name', 'first_name', 'last_name', 'party_id', 'branch', 'state', 'district')) %>% rename(post_dobbs = tweets.x, pre_dobbs = tweets.y) %>% mutate(diff = post_dobbs-pre_dobbs) %>% mutate(diff_pct=(diff/pre_dobbs)*100) %>% arrange(desc(diff_pct))
```
